name: Superior Air
about: Superior Air Flight Academy, based in Greece, is a renowned institution specializing in private and professional training for future airplane and helicopter pilots. Founded by Elias Sofianos, a retired Hellenic Air Force Colonel, the academy has a rich history, having trained over 650 pilots in the last 30 years. Superior Air offers comprehensive training programs, utilizing reliable aircraft such as the Robinson R22, R44, and R66, as well as the EC120. The academy is part of an international network, providing students with diverse flying conditions and the opportunity to learn from experienced instructors who are active commercial pilots. Superior Air also offers accommodation and employment opportunities to its students, making it an ideal place to pursue a career in aviation. With its favorable weather conditions and modern facilities, Superior Air ensures high-quality training at a reasonable price.
